document.full_text: jon niese took the loss, the mets' sixth in seven games, and chris young had his scheduled start moved because of tendinitis in his right biceps.
document.title: rockies 5, mets 4: frustration finds its way into the mets' clubhouse
lines_and_colors: jon niese took the loss, the mets' sixth in seven games, and chris young had his scheduled start moved because of tendinitis in his right biceps.
